Sports Betting in Ireland - Complete Overview
Online Betting in Ireland - Legal & Safe Options
How We Test Online Betting Sites
What are the best gambling sites in Ireland?
Best Horse Racing Betting Sites Ireland
Are Irish bookmakers better than UK bookmakers?

faq_questions.question: What are the best gambling sites in Ireland?
faq_questions.answer_requirements: Name top 5 sites, explain criteria for 'best', mention both sports betting and casino options

faq_questions.question: Are Irish bookmakers better than UK bookmakers?
faq_questions.answer_requirements: Compare Irish vs UK operators, licensing differences, odds quality, market coverage, payment methods

faq_questions.question: What makes the best online bookies in Ireland?
faq_questions.answer_requirements: List key criteria: licensing, odds quality, sports variety, payment options, mobile app, customer support

faq_questions.question: Is online betting legal in Ireland?
faq_questions.answer_requirements: Yes - explain Irish licensing system, age requirement (18+), responsible gambling requirements

faq_questions.question: Which betting sites offer the best free bets in Ireland?
faq_questions.answer_requirements: Name top 3-5 sites with best free bet offers, explain typical wagering requirements

faq_questions.question: What are the best betting sites for GAA in Ireland?
faq_questions.answer_requirements: Name top 3 sites for GAA betting, explain coverage of All-Ireland Championship, county competitions

faq_questions.question: Which sites are best for horse racing betting in Ireland?
faq_questions.answer_requirements: Top 3 sites for racing, mention Cheltenham/Punchestown coverage, best odds guaranteed features

faq_questions.question: How do I choose a licensed betting site in Ireland?
faq_questions.answer_requirements: Explain Irish licensing by Revenue Commissioners, how to verify license, importance of regulation

faq_questions.question: What payment methods do Irish betting sites accept?
faq_questions.answer_requirements: List common methods: cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, bank transfer; mention withdrawal speeds

faq_questions.question: Do all Irish betting sites have mobile apps?
faq_questions.answer_requirements: Not all - list which of the 10 featured sites have apps, iOS vs Android availability

tier_1_mandatory: App Store ratings and reviews for mobile apps
Google Play Store ratings and reviews
Reddit discussions (r/gambling, r/ireland) for user sentiment
tier_2_verification: Official brand websites for features and T&Cs verification
tier_3_sparingly: Competitor affiliate sites for research gaps only
NEVER cite affiliate sites for pros/cons or recommendations
source_requirements.citation_format: "4.9/5 (1.8M reviews) on App Store as of [date range]" or "Reddit users report [finding] across X threads"

compliance_requirements.responsible_gambling_section: MUST appear at bottom of page
compliance_requirements.no_dated_language: NEVER use dates in H1 - use Last Updated badge only

sections_per_brand: Mobile Experience (100-150 words with App Store rating)
Pros & Cons (100-150 words with 4-5 pros, 2-3 cons)

payment_preferences: Note: Mention which sites accept each method

Calculate potential parlay payouts for multiple selections
